messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] re: faith in pa
messages.msgSnippet: I live in York which is south central PA, near to MD. It is close enough to Harrisburg which I want to look into as far as possiblities. thanks Faith ...
messages.messageBody:
I live in York which is south central PA, near to MD. It is close enough to
Harrisburg which I want to look into as far as possiblities. thanks
Faith

On 9/25/07, patrick morris <katinandrea@...> wrote:
>
> hi faith, I know what you mean about lack of support, wehave
> unschooled for 2 1/2 years and it has been a slow accumulation of
> unschool people but it does come , have faith, also where in pa are
> u? there is a new unschooling support group, just parents who meet
> once a month for a 2 1/2 meeting, last month was the first meeting ,
> 18 showed up , it was very lively , about 5 dads which isn't so common
> patrick
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: re: faith in pa
messages.msgSnippet: hi faith, I know what you mean about lack of support, wehave unschooled for 2 1/2 years and it has been a slow accumulation of unschool people but  it does
messages.messageBody:
hi faith, I know what you mean about lack of support, wehave
unschooled for 2 1/2 years and it has been a slow accumulation of
unschool people but it does come , have faith, also where in pa are
u? there is a new unschooling support group, just parents who meet
once a month for a 2 1/2 meeting, last month was the first meeting ,
18 showed up , it was very lively , about 5 dads which isn't so common
patrick
